summary_detail.value: Liberty Fire Ops Brief for Friday, September 1st, 2017 given by Great Basin IMT #3 Operations Section Chief trainee OPSA(t) Bill Panagopulos. He covers how the fire fared through yesterday's Red Flag Winds w interior sports flaring up and how work progressed on the active head of the fire in the Southeast corner as lines held for a second day & crews made progress deepening the lines w good "black" up to at least a chain (66 feet) of depth or more and competed over 10 miles of hose lay to support holding and mop up actions.Link to video LF Ops Brief for

title: LF Ops Brief for Friday, September 1st, 2017 (Liberty Fire Wildfire)
